div.head: 月水乍多乍少
div.div: menstruation that is sometimes excessive other times diminished

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Yue shui zha duo zha shao

entry.def: menstruation that is sometimes excessive other times diminished

sense.def: Pathological Condition of yue shui bu tiao 月水不調 , menstrual irregularity, with the quantity of menstrual bleeding sometimes exceeding and sometimes not reaching the average. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 37 ：月水乍多乍少，為不調也 , “When menstruation is sometimes excessive and other times diminished , then this is irregular”.
